entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kugaaruk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:43 AM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 34 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 34 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 49 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 30 km/h. Low minus 37. Wind chill near minus 55. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 32. POP 30%
